spec_data.Name: perl-Queue-DBI
spec_data.Description:
Queue-DBI allows you to safely use a queueing system by preventing
backtracking, infinite loops and data loss. An emphasis of this distribution
is to provide an extremely reliable dequeueing mechanism without having to
use transactions.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:25:17 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A queueing module with an emphasis on safety, using DBI as a storage system
